title: 🤓HYDE PARK STUDIO-2BR w/ MODERN LAYOUT, HEAT & MORE $1065-$1155🤓
posting_body: ['ID: c4720dre', '"Virtual and video tours available!', 'Visit our website to view videos of our available apartments or call now to schedule a virtual tour!', 'All you need is an internet connection."', 'Now leasing in Hyde Park near 47th and Cottage Grove (60615)', 'Call 312-428-4861 today to schedule a tour!', 'Studio-2 Bedroom $1065-$1555 (555-775 sqft) -Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', 'Rental includes Free Heat, Bonus Room/Den, Granite Counter Tops, High-End Finishes & Hardwood Floors.', 'The building offers: Phone Entry Intercom, On-site Laundry Facility, and Pre-wired Phone/Cable', 'Nearby Grocery Stores include Save-A-Lot, Walmart Neighborhood Market, Zaleski & Horvath Market Cafe, Sugars Plus Inc, and Jamaica Food & Liquors.', 'Like what you see?', 'We have plenty of units available in Chicago, Park Forest, Sauk Village, West Austin, Maywood, Broadview, and many more.', '**NOTE**', 'If replying by email please remember to include your phone # and/or email address in your response so we can follow up with you directly.', '***Please note that photos are a representation of a model apartment and may not be pictures of the actual unit.', '"Pangea is an Equal Housing Opportunity provider".', 'Call 312-428-4861 to schedule a tour!', '“Pangea Real Estate practices on-going dynamic pricing for all operated units.', 'Unit promotions, discounts, and monthly rent quotes are subject to change based on day of month, current inventory, and additional market factors.', ' As such, any promotions, discounts, or monthly rent quotes are valid only at the time presented to a prospective tenant and can expire anytime thereafter.”']
